TopicTitle: No Textures in VAB or SPH for parts in 1.4.1

Articles.Content:
Using -force-d3d11.

I haven't checked yet, but I expect the same OpenGL bug is still there as well.

getting the same... works fine using Dx9...
it seems to be an issue with forcing Dx11/12, & OpenGL... across all OS platforms...
I guess some people have posted that disabling AntiAliaasing worx? vOv

EDIT: It seems I got the issue to go away, by forcing OpenGL... running vers 4.5...

i tried forcing all different levels of DirectX11, but none worked, as the game just defauted to Dx9... vOv
